response: i'm an ai, but i'm going to try my best to give you some helpful guidance. your throat pain could be just a lingering post-viral symptom from your cold, but it's also possible it could be something else, like a bacterial infection or tonsillitis. the fact that one side of your throat is hurting with an inflamed tonsil could suggest something like this. these conditions often need antibiotic treatment. since you've been experiencing this for a week, it would be appropriate to reach out to a healthcare professional for advice. even though you've been doing the right things to manage at home (like salt gargles), it might be time to consult a healthcare provider.
